message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision, specifically addressing the challenge of scale variation in CNNs. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a novel approach to learning a dynamic scaling policy from data, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on several datasets, including ImageNet and PASCAL VOC, which are commonly used in multimedia (cs.MM) research.
